item.description:
This is a free concert!! Join us Wednesday evening from 7:00-9:00pm in Blueback Square located next to Barnes & Noble.

The Glamour Girls band was founded in 1999/2000, and has been entertaining audiences at many different events throughout the region. Fronted by the lovely and talented Amber, Vanessa and Racquel, this seven-piece band will keep you dancing all night long. With a show highlighted by costume changes and eye-catching choreography, The Glamour Girls present a song selection ranging from the swing of the 40's to the early 60's Sock Hop to the Motown/Soul era, to the disco dance hits of the 70's, to the pop/rock chart-toppers of the 80's and 90's.
Great band -- hope to see you there
Nancy

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Glamour Girls - 7:00-9:00pm in Blueback Square next to Barnes & Noble
